title: Calofood
text: Calofood package comprises dataset containing calorie information popular fast food restaurants. dataset sourced Tidytuesday repository available GitHub. package provides users range functions. Firstly, includes Shiny app integrated package, enabling interactive interactions users. app utilizes dataset provide valuable insights users. Additionally, package offers plot function, allowing users generate bar plots based input, leveraging data within package. Lastly, numeric function facilitates annual compound interest calculations using three essential parameters: principal, rate, time. feature enhances package’s versatility including financial calculations alongside nutritional analysis.

title: Calofood
text: Calofood versatile package empowers users conveniently access scrutinize nutritional data popular fast-food chains. provides intuitive interface obtaining calorie counts nutritional specifics diverse range menu items. package proves valuable aiming maintain vitamin-rich diet dining . Calofood facilitates users making informed dietary choices enabling easy access comparison nutritional information across various fast-food items available package. equips individuals information needed align nutritional goals.

title: Calofood
text: dataset loaded file named fastfoodcalories.csv. title: Calculates Compound Interest — comp_int
text: function accepts three inputs, computes compound interest, provides result. Additionally, incorporates mechanism error checking guarantee inputs positive values since negative values zeros illogical within context compound interest computations. Principal (numeric): initial sum money investment, referred principal amount, used computing compound interest. must positive numeric value, symbolizing initial monetary amount. Rate (numeric): annual interest rate, expressed decimal, governing rate principal amount increases time due interest. also positive numeric value. Time (numeric): duration, years, interest computed. parameter signifies period principal amount accrues interest. must positive numeric value indicating number years.

title: Calculates Compound Interest — comp_int
text: principal Initial investment amount (positive numeric value). rate Annual interest rate decimal (positive numeric value). time Duration years interest calculation (positive numeric value).

title: Calculates Compound Interest — comp_int
text: compunded interest amount input.
